name: 2 Macintosh apples
instructions: Peel apples, cut apples around core, cut apples into one inch chunks.
Combine apples, water and lemon juice into a pan.
Heat to boiling over medium heat.  Simmer uncovered stirring occasionally to break up apples, until tender – 5 to 10 min.
Mix nutmeg, cinnamon and sugar together.  Put in pan together.  Use low to medium heat.
Heat to a boil.  Cook for 1 minute until desired texture.
